You increase your maximum energy level by 100. Getting above 100 does not strengthen most abilities.

You can overpower the last hostile target, if they have less health than you and drain them dry.

You can no longer regenerate health and do not deal increased damage while sneaking. Your sex partners gain increased enjoyment based on all of your succubus skill levels. Below 0 Energy you learn all skills at half the normal rate, spells and power attacks costs twice as much.
You can regenerate health again at 50 or more energy.

You can act exhausted and lure ne'er-do-wellers into having their way with you. This only works outside of combat and alerts their teammates after the deed.

You can ask to punish submissive people in any safe location.

Depending on your succubus type, you refresh 10 energy oer hour while waiting in specific circumstances.
Depending on your succubus type, you refresh 20 energy oer hour while waiting in specific circumstances.
When enemies attack you in melee, they have a small chance  based on their arousal to start masturbating, or if it's a creature it takes massive damage instead.

While wearing a collar you lose less energy, deal more physical damage to noble and immoral people and have a greater chance at intimidating those.
You refresh twice as much energy from your drain.
You refresh three times as much energy from your drain.
You gain a health absorb spell that costs energy.

If you let cum on your skin "expire" you gain a bit energy back.
You learn to limit your drain somewhat. Friendly targets can be drained again after a day.
You learn to limit your drain somewhat. Friendly targets can be drained again after only half of the time and the debuff is no longer as debilitating.

You can sacrifice 20 energy to get a destruction, illusion and magicka buff for a minute.
You can ask people to compliment you to regain energy.
You can ask people to worship you to regain energy and a temporary buff.
When you refresh your energy, you also regenerate to full health.

You can ask for a kiss to refresh your energy. While kissing someone, you can take what you want from their inventory.

You are maximally aroused. Friendly people who get you off, gain a strong buff to all their stats.
As love conquers all, you gain increased damage against creatures incapable of love such as monsters, but you lose damage against humans if you haven't had a romantic interaction in a while.
You restoration skill increases 20% faster. Restoration spells cost twice as much. If you have been praised recently, they also heal twice as much.

You double the bonus max health from the body skill and add your base skill level on top. If you are above 200 current health, you take double damage from all sources. This penalty increases triples or sextuples, if you haven't been below 200 health or spanked/bitten in a while.

If you have eggs in your belly, you find more ingredients to eat for your spawn. If these kids are spiders or chaurus, your poisons deal more damage based on your drain level. If your belly is empty, all spells cost twice as much.

You gain immunity to diseases and poisons. Your spells costs get reduced to maximally 50% depending on how filled up you are. But if you have no cum inside you, you take double damage from ice and fire.
You take 10% less physical damage. When you get your ass spanked, you learn faster for a while. If your ass is unspanked for to long, your ass cheeks clap to loud and can alert enemies.
Having sex for the first time with a person in a marriage that does not involve you increases your XP gained by a lot. As this upsets her greatly, Mara forbids you from wearing her amulet.
While you are collared, you halve the time between your barks and halve your effectiveness to intimidate people. If you take of your collar, you lose 50% energy and are sad for a day.

While you are collared, you halve the time between your barks. If you recently had sex with someone who has wolves blood, you learn warrior skills 50% faster. You are a confused dog without your collar and can not learn any skills without it.
If you choose Mahogany, you can gain energy from hostile people, but you can no longer get energy from wholesome activities.
You start each day with a new tattoo, these make you more durable increasing your armor by 10.

Your potions and poisons are 10% stronger and while you are digesting cum or have eaten an ingredient or drank a potion recently, you increase your chance of picking an additional ingredient by 10%. Professional alchemists dislike you and charge you 20% worse prices.
You become exhibitionistic and gain 50 stamina. While you are top- and bottomless you gain increased armor. But if you put on clothes again, your speed decreases.
Bimbos can not become satiated, but they also can not fall below 0 energy.

Selling prices are reduced to a quarter. This has made you more aware of the world around you, increasing your learning rate by 100%. If you recently had sex with a shopkeep, you reduce their prices by a quarter.

Wearing revealing clothing make your illusion and destruction spells more potent based on your seduction level. You are so used to enemies being distracted by your choice of clothes, that these spells get weaker if you wear less revealing clothing.

You gain a shout to overpower low health dragons to end them. You have increased armor and you gain a longer satiated time when you "absorb" dragons, but your other ways to become satiated only last half as long.
You gain a shout to overpower low health dragons to end them. You also additionally gain a longer satiated time when you "absorb" dragons and have  even more armor.
You gain 50 max health, and having cum on your skin increases your confidence which increases your two-handed damage. If you haven't had cum on your skin in a day, you can no longer talk to non-men.
You like most reds anyway. When you get offered a tint you have to take it, but you gain twice the succubus xp from now on. This tint can not be taken later.

If you choose Scarlet, you can only gain energy from people that like you. Feeding on them grants magic resist and speechcraft for a while. You can also enthrall people who would die for you. You also gain a succubus perk point.
Your love for being choked makes you light headed, increasing your carry weight by 100. If you have not been choked in a while, you can no longer shout.
Your enchantments are 10% stronger. If you had a hypnosis session or masturbated while fantasizing about it recently, you learn magic skills 20% faster. This buff refreshes automatically.
You're gay, good for you! You gain triple xp from interactions with your gender, but half it in other cases.

Your two-handed damage doubles while cum is on you, stacking with Razzmatazz, your destruction damage doubles while cum is in you. You can only talk to non-cum producers and refresh energy if you have had cum on you recently and have currently cum in you.
Your melee attacks deal extra fire damage over time, but if you haven't masturbated in a while, you take double damage from fire.
